original_text: If someone has bent something, you cannot always make it straight again. You cannot count things, if they are not there. 1: These were probably proverbs. There are things that you cannot change. There are things that you cannot even describe. If someone has bent something, you cannot always make it straight again. You cannot count things, if they are not there. 1: These were probably proverbs. There are things that you cannot change. There are things that you cannot even describe. If someone has bent something,
korean_text: 구부러진 것도 곧게 할 수 없고 모자란 것도 셀 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: you cannot always make it straight again.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 항상 그것을 다시 곧게 만들 수는 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: There are things that you cannot change.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 바꿀 수 없는 것들이 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: There are things that you cannot even describe.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 심지어 설명할 수도 없는 것들이 있습니다.
